AccretionAmortizationOfDiscountsAndPremi.label: Accretion (Amortization) of Discounts and Premiums, Investments
AccretionAmortizationOfDiscountsAndPremi.description: The sum of the periodic adjustments of the differences between securities' face values and purchase prices that are charged against earnings. This is called accretion if the security was purchased at a discount and amortization if it was purchased at premium. As a noncash item, this element is an adjustment to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable.label: Accrued Investment Income Receivable
AccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable.description: Interest, dividends, rents, ancillary and other revenues earned but not yet received by the entity on its investments.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Additional Paid in Capital
AdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

AdditionsToContractHoldersFunds.label: Additions to Contract Holders Funds
AdditionsToContractHoldersFunds.description: The cash inflow from a segregated fund account during the period.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRealEstate.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Real Estate
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRealEstate.description: The reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified fixed maturity real estate loans as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of that loan portfolio.

AociTaxAttributableToParent.label: AOCI Tax, Attributable to Parent
AociTaxAttributableToParent.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale that have been in a continuous loss position for twelve months or longer.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Accumulated Loss
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale in a continuous loss position.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of investments in debt and equity securities in an unrealized loss position which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale that have been in a continuous loss position for less than twelve months.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Realized Gain (Loss)
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.description: This item represents the difference between the gross realized gains and losses realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities. Additionally, this item would include any losses recognized for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) of the subject investments in debt and equity securities.

BenefitsLossesAndExpenses.label: Benefits, Losses and Expenses
BenefitsLossesAndExpenses.description: The total amount of expense recognized during the period for future policy benefits, claims and claims adjustment costs, and for selling, general and administrative costs.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CededPremiumsPayable.label: Ceded Premiums Payable
CededPremiumsPayable.description: The consideration due to the assuming enterprise as of the balance sheet date under the terms of the reinsurance contract in exchange for the right to receive reimbursement from such entity for covered claims and expenses.

CededPremiumsWritten.label: Ceded Premiums Written
CededPremiumsWritten.description: Amount of written premiums ceded to other entities.

CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrust.label: Common Stock, Shares Held in Employee Trust
CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrust.description: Value of common stock issued to a trust (for example, but not limited to, rabbi trust) set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Debt and Lease Obligation
DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DebtIssuanceCostsIncurredDuringNoncashOr.label: Debt Issuance Costs Incurred During Noncash or Partial Noncash Transaction
DebtIssuanceCostsIncurredDuringNoncashOr.description: The amount of debt issuance costs that were incurred during a noncash or partial noncash transaction.

DebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities
DebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInt.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInt.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Not Previously Recorded
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of expense for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), for which no credit loss was previously recorded.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Not to Sell before Recovery, Credit Loss, Previously Recorded, Expense (Reversal)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), not intended to be sold and not more likely than not will be required to sell before recovery of amortized cost basis, with previously recorded allowance.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Accrued Interest, Writeoff
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) recognized by reversing interest income.

DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate
DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of debt outstanding.

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizatio.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Amortization Expense
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs.

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizatio.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Amortization Expense, Effect of Adjustments to Estimated Gross Profit or Estimated Gross Margin
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) of deferred policy acquisition costs from a revision in estimated gross profit or estimated gross margin.

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizatio.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Amortization Expense, Other
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizatio.description: Amount of other increase (decrease) to amortization expense of deferred policy acquisition cost (DAC).

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force.

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAdditions.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Capitalization
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAdditions.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized.

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsImpairment.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Impairment Loss
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsImpairment.description: Amount of impairment loss for deferred policy acquisition costs.

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostUnrealizedI.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Unrealized Investment Gain (Loss)
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostUnrealizedI.description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) deferred policy acquisition cost.

DerivativeAssetFairValueOfCollateral.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value of Collateral
DerivativeAssetFairValueOfCollateral.description: Fair value of securities received as collateral against derivative assets.

DerivativeAssets.label: Derivative Asset
DerivativeAssets.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash
DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnSe.label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Securities
DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnSe.description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Amount Not Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.description: Fair value, after offset of derivative liability, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, before offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Amount Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset offset against an obligation to return collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Amount Not Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, after offset of derivative asset, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, elected not to be and before offset against a right to receive collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Amount Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset offset against the right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

DerivativeLiabilities.label: Derivative Liability
DerivativeLiabilities.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOfCollateral.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value of Collateral
DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOfCollateral.description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against derivative liabilities.

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EmbeddedDerivativeGainLossOnEmbeddedDeri.label: Embedded Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Embedded Derivative, Net
EmbeddedDerivativeGainLossOnEmbeddedDeri.description: Net Increase or Decrease in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

EquitySecuritiesFvNi.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI
EquitySecuritiesFvNi.description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculat.label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Percent Debt Securities
FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculat.description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are debt securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Issuances
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Purchases
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Purchases, (Sales), Issuances, (Settlements)
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of purchases, (sales), issuances and (settlements) of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Sales
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of sale of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Settlements
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of settlement of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset Transfers Into Level 3
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of transfer of financial instrument classified as an asset into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Transfers out of Level 3
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as an asset out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

FederalHomeLoanBankStock.label: Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
FederalHomeLoanBankStock.description: Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

FinancialLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial Liabilities Fair Value Disclosure
FinancialLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial obligations, including, but not limited to, debt instruments, derivative liabilities, federal funds purchased and sold under agreements to repurchase, securities loaned or sold under agreements to repurchase, financial instruments sold not yet purchased, guarantees, line of credit, loans and notes payable, servicing liability, and trading liabilities.

FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestBefore.label: Financing Receivable, Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestBefore.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestWriteo.label: Financing Receivable, Accrued Interest, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestWriteo.description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on financing receivable recognized by reversing interest income.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.label: Financing Receivable, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.description: Amount of financing receivable originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.label: Financing Receivable, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.description: Amount of financing receivable originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.label: Financing Receivable, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.label: Financing Receivable, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.label: Financing Receivable, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.description: Amount of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.label: Financing Receivable, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.description: Amount of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableRevolving.label: Financing Receivable, Revolving
FinancingReceivableRevolving.description: Amount of financing receivable that can be withdrawn, repaid and redrawn.

FundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreementsAsset.label: Funds Held under Reinsurance Agreements, Asset
FundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreementsAsset.description: Amount of the reinsurer's funds held on its behalf by the ceding insurer, including funds held in trust, under reinsurance treaties or contracts with the assuming insurer as security for the payment of the obligations thereunder.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

GainLossOnSaleOfDebtInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Debt Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfDebtInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of debt securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

GainLossOnSaleOfDerivatives.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Derivatives
GainLossOnSaleOfDerivatives.description: The difference between the book value and the sale price of options, swaps, futures, forward contracts, and other derivative instruments. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GuaranteedInterestContracts.label: Guaranteed Interest Contracts
GuaranteedInterestContracts.description: The amount of the liability as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the guarantee given by the insurance entity to contract holders of a specified rate of return (a guaranteed yield) on their investments for a specified period.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInvestmentIncom.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Investment Income Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInvestmentIncom.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in investment income that has been earned but not yet received in cash.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredPolicyAcquisit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredPolicyAcquisit.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the balance sheet value of capitalized sales costs that are associated with acquiring a new insurance customers.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingCapitalN.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets and Liabilities, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingCapitalN.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets after deduction of operating liabilities classified as other.

InterestCreditedToPolicyholdersAccountBa.label: Policyholder Account Balance, Interest Expense
InterestCreditedToPolicyholdersAccountBa.description: Amount of interest expense for allocation to policyholder account balance.

InterestCreditedToPolicyOwnerAccount.label: Interest Credited to Policy Owner Account
InterestCreditedToPolicyOwnerAccount.description: Amount of expense for unpaid portion of interest credited to policy owner account.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InvestmentIncomeNet.label: Investment Income, Net
InvestmentIncomeNet.description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

Investments.label: Investments
Investments.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all investments.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExp.label: Liability for Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
LiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExp.description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsAndUnpai.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits and Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsAndUnpai.description: The aggregate amount of policy reserves (provided for future obligations including unpaid claims and claims adjustment expenses) and policy benefits (liability for future policy benefits) as of the balance sheet date; grouped amount of all the liabilities associated with the company's insurance policies.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsDisabili.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Disability and Accident Benefits
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsDisabili.description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under disability and accident insurance contracts.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsIndividu.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Individual and Group Annuities and Supplementary Contracts
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsIndividu.description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under individual and group annuities and supplementary insurance contracts.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsLife.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Life
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsLife.description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under long-term life insurance contracts.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsOtherCon.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Other Contracts
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsOtherCon.description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under other insurance contracts.

LiabilityForPolicyholderContractDeposits.label: Liability for Policyholder Contract Deposits, Interest Rate
LiabilityForPolicyholderContractDeposits.description: Rate of interest credited to policyholder deposits.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumAmountOutstan.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Amount Outstanding During Period
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumAmountOutstan.description: Maximum amount borrowed under the credit facility at any time during the period.

LoansInsurancePolicy.label: Loans, Gross, Insurance Policy
LoansInsurancePolicy.description: Amount before allowance of loans made to policy and contract holders using their life insurance contracts' cash value or separate accounts as collateral. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProduc.label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Estimated Average Investment Yield
LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProduc.description: Estimated average rate of return on investments which is included in the calculation of the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

LossRecognizedOnAssetsTransferredToSepar.label: Loss Recognized on Assets Transferred to Separate Account, Gross
LossRecognizedOnAssetsTransferredToSepar.description: Amount of loss recognized during the reporting period on assets that were transferred into separate accounts.

MinorityInterest.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MinorityInterest.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

MinorityInterestPeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Period Increase (Decrease)
MinorityInterestPeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Net Increase or Decrease in balance of noncontrolling interest in the subsidiary during the reporting period.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Commercial and Consumer, Net
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetInvestmentIncome.label: Net Investment Income
NetInvestmentIncome.description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

ObligationToReturnSecuritiesReceivedAsCo.label: Obligation to Return Securities Received as Collateral
ObligationToReturnSecuritiesReceivedAsCo.description: The fair value of collateral received by the entity associated with securities borrowed that must be returned if the counterparty fulfills its obligations. It appears on the balance sheet as a liability and has a corresponding asset that appears on the balance sheet called Securities Received as Collateral.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Reclassifications, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonrecurringExpense.label: Other Nonrecurring Expense
OtherNonrecurringExpense.description: Amount of other expense that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

OtherNonrecurringIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonrecurring (Income) Expense
OtherNonrecurringIncomeExpense.description: Amount of other expense (income) that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

OtherPolicyholderFunds.label: Other Policyholder Funds
OtherPolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholders for funds held that are returnable under the terms of insurance contracts, classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.label: Payments to Acquire Limited Partnership Interests
PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.label: Proceeds from Limited Partnership Investments
ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.description: Cash inflow received as distributions, returns of capital, or sale proceeds from partnership interests held for investment purposes.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Mortgage Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.label: Reclassification from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Current Period, Net of Tax
ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, before Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodTax.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Tax
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss).

ReinsuranceReceivablesCaseBasis.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Case Basis
ReinsuranceReceivablesCaseBasis.description: The sum for all reinsurance arrangements of the known and estimated amount recoverable as of the balance sheet date from a given reinsurer for claims paid or incurred by the ceding insurer and associated claims settlement expenses for each reinsurance arrangement (or, the sum of all cases determined individually, probably applying different assumptions to each arrangement).

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss
ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepurchaseAgreementsInterestExpenseAmoun.label: Repurchase Agreements, Interest Expense Amount
RepurchaseAgreementsInterestExpenseAmoun.description: This is the amount of interest expense incurred during the reporting period as a result of repurchase agreements.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SalesCommissionsAndFees.label: Sales Commissions and Fees
SalesCommissionsAndFees.description: Primarily represents commissions incurred in the period based upon the sale by commissioned employees or third parties of the entity's goods or services, and fees for sales assistance or product enhancements performed by third parties (such as a distributor or value added reseller).

ScheduleOfFairValueOfSeparateAccountsByM.label: Schedule of Fair Value of Separate Accounts by Major Category of Investment, Fair Value
ScheduleOfFairValueOfSeparateAccountsByM.description: Fair value amount of the specified investment category of assets maintained in separate accounts as of the balance sheet date.

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.label: Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedFairValueOfCollateral.label: Securities Loaned, Fair Value of Collateral
SecuritiesLoanedFairValueOfCollateral.description: Fair value of the securities pledged as collateral against securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedGross.label: Securities Loaned, Gross
SecuritiesLoanedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesReserveDepositRequiredAndMade.label: Securities Reserve Deposit Required and Made
SecuritiesReserveDepositRequiredAndMade.description: Securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Asset
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of asset associated with funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Gross
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.label: Withdrawal from Contract Holders Funds
WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

AlternativeInvestment.label: Alternative Investment
AlternativeInvestment.description: Fair value of investment other than investment in equity security, investment in debt security and equity method investment. Includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Example includes, but is not limited to, investment in hedge fund, venture capital fund, private equity fund, and real estate partnership or fund.

AssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
AssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

CashAndCashEquivalentsFairValueDisclosur.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Fair Value Disclosure
CashAndCashEquivalentsFairValueDisclosur.description: Fair value portion of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockHeldInTrust.label: Common Stock Held in Trust
CommonStockHeldInTrust.description: Value of common stock held in trust.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CostsAndExpenses.label: Costs and Expenses
CostsAndExpenses.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

DebtInstrumentCollateralAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Collateral Amount
DebtInstrumentCollateralAmount.description: Amount of assets pledged to secure a debt instrument.

DebtLongtermAndShorttermCombinedAmount.label: Debt, Long-term and Short-term, Combined Amount
DebtLongtermAndShorttermCombinedAmount.description: Represents the aggregate of total long-term debt, including current maturities and short-term debt.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Increase
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and beneficial interest, purchased with credit deterioration.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Securities Sold
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of decrease in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from sale.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Sell before Recovery
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of decrease in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from intent to sell or more likely than not will be required to sell before recovery of amortized cost basis.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of writeoff of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

Depreciation.label: Depreciation
Depreciation.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.description: Fair value of liability associated with financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimSecuri.label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimSecuri.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAsset.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAsset.description: Fair value of asset associated with financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Amount Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Asset
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount of asset associated with derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Gross
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DividendsCommonStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock
DividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDer.label: Embedded Derivative, Fair Value of Embedded Derivative Liability
EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDer.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as a liability.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBB.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Branch of FHLB Bank, Amount of Advances
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBB.description: Amount of advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestAfterA.label: Financing Receivable, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestAfterA.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Increase
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff, after Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount, after recovery, of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring
FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

FundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreementsLiabi.label: Funds Held under Reinsurance Agreements, Liability
FundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreementsLiabi.description: Amount of funds held as security for payments to be received under reinsurance contracts.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments, Net, Pretax
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Average Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.description: Average amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Interest Income, Accrual Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.description: Amount of interest income, recognized on accrual basis, on financing receivables, for which there is a related allowance for credit losses and are recognized as impaired.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

InterestExpenseSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreem.label: Interest Expense, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
InterestExpenseSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreem.description: Gross expenses on securities sold coupled with an agreement to repurchase the same from the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price within a fixed or variable time period.

InvestmentIncomeInvestmentExpense.label: Investment Income, Investment Expense
InvestmentIncomeInvestmentExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the generation of investment income.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Gross
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, as of the balance sheet date.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Incurred Benefits
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefit expense incurred for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Payment for Benefits
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholders and contract holders for guaranteed minimum benefit payments.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.
