Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

MortgageLoansInProcessOfForeclosureAmoun.label: Mortgage Loans in Process of Foreclosure, Amount
MortgageLoansInProcessOfForeclosureAmoun.description: Recorded investment of consumer mortgage loan receivables secured by residential real estate properties for which formal foreclosure proceedings are in process.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings and other comprehensive loss (OCI).

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.label: Payments to Acquire Finance Receivables
PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of amounts due from customers, clients, lessees, borrowers, or others under the terms of its agreements therewith.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.description: The cash flow from investments sold under the agreement to repurchase such investment.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) for debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfFinanceRe.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfFinanceRe.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale or collection of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.label: Payments of FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.label: Securities Loaned, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedAsset.label: Securities Loaned, Asset
SecuritiesLoanedAsset.description: Amount of asset associated with securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral.

SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.label: Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio
StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).
